info.title: Learning Management System API
info.description: The Learning Management System API is a private API accessible by Adaa Staff Members to get insights on the training programs offered by the organization to employees of public entities whose performance is measured and monitored.

servers.description: Base Path for Testing Purposes Only

get.summary: Provide summary of the training programs offered by Adaa through their Learning Management System
get.description: Return a summarized view of all the training programs offered by Adaa to the employees of public entities

200.description: return successfully the summary details of all the training programs offered

get.summary: Provide summary of the courses offered by Adaa through their Learning Management System
get.description: Return a summarized view of all the courses offered by Adaa to the employees of public entities

200.description: return successfully the summary details of all the courses offered

get.summary: Provide summary of the evaluations for the training programs offered by Adaa through their Learning Management System
get.description: Return a summarized view of all the evaluations for the training programs offered by Adaa to the employees of public entities

200.description: return successfully the summary details of all the evaluations for the training programs offered

schema.description: list of all evaluations for all the training programs clustered by the year of evaluation

get.summary: Provide detail description of the training program offered over the years
get.description: Return the detailed description of the training program offered over the years by Adaa

parameters.name: course-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification number of the training program

200.description: return the detail description of the training program

get.summary: Provide detail description of the entities that have participated in a particular training program over the years
get.description: Return the detailed description of the entities that have participated in the training program over the years

parameters.name: course-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification number of the training program

200.description: return the list of all the entities that have participated in the course over the years

schema.description: list of all the entities that have participated in the course over the years

get.summary: Provide detail description of all the events that the particular training program has been offered in over the years
get.description: Return the detailed description of the events that the training program was offered in over the years

parameters.name: course-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification number of the training program

200.description: return the list of all the events associated with the training program. An event is an offering of the course at a scheduled period of time. Each course can have multiple events

schema.description: list of all the events associated with the training program

parameters.description: the unqiue identification number of the entity

200.description: return successfully the detail description of the public entity's participation in the training programs offered by Adaa

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification number of the entity
